page.title: 13THE LOBSTER POT
page.content:
The Lobster Pot is found at L'Etacq. It is a well known local hotel which has built up a reputation for having a first class restaurant.
Very good quality meals are always available and the seafood dishes are a must.
In 1985 this hotel announced that it had had the latest luxury fittings included in its modernisation of the guest rooms at the hotel.
Each room has a private bathroom, telephone, television, tea/coffee facilities and refrigerator.
Besides all of this luxury most of the rooms have a view over one of the most attractive bays in Europe if not the World.
